guidelines: Write tests that cover user flows and interactions
Use descriptive test names that explain what is being tested
Test error scenarios and edge cases
best_practices: Separate unit, integration, and e2e tests
Use page objects for e2e testing
Test both happy paths and error states
Test performance and Core Web Vitals
Keep test data separate from test logic
